description: Matthew Bourgaize's body was found almost a month after he went missing from a mental health unit.
title: Matthew Bourgaize: Inquest opens into missing man death
title_page: Matthew Bourgaize: Inquest opens into missing man death - BBC News
maintext: Following an assessment by a psychiatrist he was not considered safe to be managed in the community and, after he refused an informal hospital admission, an application for his detention was approved by HM Procureur.
